title: 한편 모두 같은 날에 일어난 일이었는데 왜 그렇게 말했는지는 나도 잘 모르겠다.
content:
[[include :scpko:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include info:start]]
**원문:** [http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/also-this-all-happened-on-the-same-day Also This All Happened On The Same Day, So I Don't Know Why He Said It Like That.] by [[*user Doctor Cimmerian]]
**번역:** [[*user XCninety]]
[[include info:end]]

> 이하는 신규 승진한 오스틴(Austin) 제12기지 이사관이 마지막으로 남긴 음성메시지이다. 해당 이사관이 2013년 12월 25일 발생한 전(全) 기지 격리 실패 사태 때문에 정신붕괴 상태에 빠졌는지, 아니면 확인되지 않은 밈 효과에 영향을 받고 있었는지는 현재 알 수 없다.
> 
> 이사관의 상태가 어땠건, 해당 기지에서는 방송 1분 43초 이후 지상과 지하에 각각 설치된 최후비상핵무기 두 기가 동시 작동되었다. 생존자는 없다.

[[include :snippets:html5player
|type=audio
|url=http://ko.scp-wiki.net/local--files/also-this-all-happened-on-the-same-day/Site-12.mp3]]

------

[[collapsible show="+ 가사"]]
[[div style="float:left;width:50%;"]]
On the first day of my promotion,
This happened to me:
A site-wide containment breach.

On the second day of my promotion,
This happened to me:
Two fail-safe nukes,
And a site-wide containment breach.

On the third day of my promotion,
This happened to me:
Three dead staff,
Two fail-safe nukes,
And a site-wide containment breach.

On the fourth day of my promotion,
This happened to me:
Four broken necks,
Three dead staff,
Two fail-safe nukes,
And a site-wide containment breach.

Four broken necks,
Three dead staff,

And a site-wide containment breach.

Fifth level access,
Four broken necks,
Three dead staff,

And a site-wide containment breach.

On the seventh day of my promotion,
This happened to me:
Seven D-class dying,
Six Ethics filings,
Fifth level access,
Four broken necks,
Three dead staff,
Two fail-safe nukes,
And a site-wide containment breach.

Eight termination testing,
Seven D-class dying,

Four broken necks,

Eight termination testing,
Seven D-class dying,
Six Ethics filings,
Fifth level access,
Four broken necks,
Three dead staff,
Two fail-safe nukes,

Ten agents training,

Eight termination testing,
Seven D-class dying,
Six Ethics filings,
Fifth level access,
Four broken necks,
Three dead staff,
Two fail-safe nukes,
And a site-wide containment breach.

On the twelfth day of my promotion,
This happened to me:
Twelve doctors researching,
Eleven amnestics dosing,
Ten agents training,

Eight termination testing,
Seven D-class dying,

Fifth level access,
Four broken necks,

[[div style="float:left;width:50%;"]]
